projectInstructions: This is an Angular project with a Django Ninja API backend.
The project is a web application for climbing competitons and leagues, and a ranking and scoring system.
The template is a PrimeNG template with a main layout and a sidebar menu.
The project uses Tailwind CSS for styling and some PrimeNG components.
Always use PrimeNG components for styling when possible and Tailwind CSS for custom styling.
The web application style is modern, clean and minimalistic.
